channel.title: How to get ur server online
channel.description:
k well ive seen people posting about how to get your server online... so i thought id make a post
2 chapters:
chapter 1:learning how to get a source and running it
k well first go to the rs2 server downloads and look for a good source (good base) once you got it open up your client.java from the download and change what the source is called to yours so: the one i download its called jordiescape... so i open up client.java and ctrl + F and in the first field i put jordiescape and in the other 1 cmanscape. now if ur server is like dodian were its uber and dodian, just do that 2 times. once you got that all done, scroll down the files and double click runserver.bat or compile.bat or w/e and presto! and im just hoping u have no-ip cause im too lazy to right it :S
chapter 2:mopar serverstatus
to do this go to www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php and scroll all the way down and there should be a "post ur server" or w/e, so runserver/post/log on and play!
credits:God Of Ikiliki or w/e (i dont know how to spell :S), me cman19283746 for writing this and my friend for getting my first server up :) ty man!

item.title: How to get ur server online
item.dc:creator: @cman19283746 cman19283746
item.description:
@cman19283746 wrote:

k well ive seen people posting about how to get your server online…
so i thought id make a post

2 chapters:

chapter 1:learning how to get a source and running it

k well first go to the rs2 server downloads and look for a good source (good base) once you got it open up your client.java from the download and change what the source is called to yours so: the one i download its called jordiescape… so i open up client.java and ctrl + F and in the first field i put jordiescape and in the other 1 cmanscape.
now if ur server is like dodian were its uber and dodian, just do that 2 times. once you got that all done, scroll down the files and double click runserver.bat or compile.bat or w/e and presto! and im just hoping u have no-ip cause im too lazy to right it :S

chapter 2:mopar serverstatus

to do this go to www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php and scroll all the way down and there should be a “post ur server” or w/e,
so runserver/post/log on and play!

credits:God Of Ikiliki or w/e (i dont know how to spell :S), me cman19283746 for writing this and my friend for getting my first server up ty man!
